subject: Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The discus champion Robert Harting said he wanted to be taken off the short list for athlete of the year because it also contains Gatlin, an American sprinter who has been convicted of doping.
snippet: The discus champion Robert Harting said he wanted to be taken off the short list for athlete of the year because it also contains Gatlin, an American sprinter who has been convicted of doping.
